aronne Ilza Bormul was a renowned member of the noble patriar Bormul family of Baldurs Gate many years before the late 15 century DR.
Baronne Ilza Bormul was a historic individual, a patriar who lived many years before the . Ilza owned slave-labor mines in the mountains of Amn, importing ingots of precious metals to enrich herself and the city of Baldurs Gate. The bloody nature of Ilza Bormuls ingots was often not mentioned in classless and history books, however, her cruel imports were named on page thirty seven of Baldurs Gate and the Dialectics of Plunder, a book sold in the Gate in the late 15 century DR.
